item.title: Capture images and videos of our Amazon products with your phones - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for advice from real customers to improve our product and service. Our products are crawl space vapor barriers. You need capture images and videos of our Amazon products with your mobile phone. No complete skills are required, simply take3-5shots with your phone, and shoot a short 30-135 seconds showcase.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 22, 2024 02:24 UTC
Category: Local Photography
Skills:Photo Editing, Video Editing, Product Review, Amazon, Review or Feedback Collection
Skills: Photo Editing, Video Editing, Product Review, Amazon, Review or Feedback Collection

item.title: Need On-Trend and creative video editor uplevel talking head videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor who is capable of recreating the graphics and editing in the example video below but in their own style.  This will be added to talking head videos.  You will find it about 3 sections down from the top.  

NOTE:  Since there will likely be 100 or more bids, I will prioritize anyone who took the time to watch at least 3 minutes of the  video discusses some aspect of it in their bid.  If you are capable of doing this work, I encourage you to invest the time to watch the video so I can find you and we can get to work.  I am looking forward to meeting you and ideally a long term editing relationship.

example video is about a third of the way down the page:

https://www.heyfriends.studio/

Hourly Range: $10.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 02:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Corporate Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Corporate Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography
Country: United States

item.title: Tik Tok-Style Shorts and Stills from Long Form Video of Gay Men's Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create 2 Tik Tok-style shorts and capture 5-10 stills from a long-form video with a focus on gay men's content.  Then you will compile a list of Twitter handles and Reddit feeds that match our target audience to post them on.  The ideal candidate should know how to make shorts of the best moments in the video and be able to create engaging and visually appealing content that resonates with our target audience, which we will explain.   Attention to detail is crucial to ensure the stills accurately capture the essence of the video. This project requires creativity, technical skills, and the ability to work independently. If you have a passion for video editing and content creation, we want to hear from you!

Relevant skills:

- Video editing
- Content creation
- Social Media Marketing
- Market Research

There is the possibility for regular work if you do this job well.

Budget: $12
Posted On: June 22, 2024 02:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Need Rockstar Dropshipping Facebook & TikTok ads UGC Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there!

I’m looking for a hardworking video editor that is looking for potential to grow within my company.

I am looking for someone who wants to improve their skills and create & edit WINNING creatives for TikTok or Facebook ads with the content I provide.

Please answer all of the questions below.

1. What editing software do you use?
2. Do you use text to speech on the TikTok app for TikTok ads?
3. Do you know where to find the most recent viral songs?
4. Do you know how to find viral trends and use them to create ads? a
5. Have you worked with other brands / dropshippers that have done over $1,000 in sales per day with the content you’ve made?
6. Do you have a team you work with? If so, how many people?
7. How long have you been editing videos for?
8. Do you know how to use After effects?
9. Do you think your skills could use some improvement?
10. Do you think you could be more efficient with your work?
11. Are you a problem solver? Provide an example of a time you solved a problem that seemed impossible to solve at first.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 02:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Facebook Advertising, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Facebook, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Facebook Advertising, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Facebook, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply
